tool.help:
**What it does**
Circular visualization
Circos is a software package for visualizing data and information. It visualizes data in a circular layout — this makes Circos ideal for exploring relationships between objects or positions. There are other reasons why a circular layout is advantageous, not the least being the fact that it is attractive.
Circos is ideal for creating publication-quality infographics and illustrations with a high data-to-ink ratio, richly layered data and pleasant symmetries. You have fine control each element in the figure to tailor its focus points and detail to your audience.
.. image:: ./static/images/circos-sample-panel.png
-----
**Image properties**
- Image directory - Image filename - Craete png image - Create svg image - Image raduis - Image AngleOffset
-----
**Highlights Proprerties (can have multiple highlights)**
- Highlight file - r0 (radius 0) - r1 (radius 1)
-----
**Plots Proprerties (can have multiple Plots)**
- Data File - Type - Layers - Layers overflow - margin - thickness - radius 0 - radius 1 - min - max - color - fill color - fill under - orientation
- sort bin values - exend bin
- axis - axis color - axis thickness - axis spacing
- show links - links dimensions - link thickness - link color
- label size - label font - label snuggle - label max snuggle distance - label snuggle sampling - label snuggle tolerance - snuggle link overlap tolerance - snuggle refine
- plot padding - plot rpadding - **Rules (can have multiple rules)** - condition - rule importance - rule color - fill under
-----
